name: Mega Expanded Drive: Family Games Pack
name_original: Mega Expanded Drive: Family Games Pack
description:
This game was made for the Kenney Jam 2022. It is also inspired by stupid cheap games on consoles such as Humanitarian Helicopter and M&M's Kart Racing.

Drive like crazy in this epic action simulator! Spin your wheels across 3 different maps! Drift through gaps the size of your mother. Okay maybe not that one.

Your car will grow accordingly to its velocity.

Use the arrow keys to drive. Happy drifting!
